hero.title: Hi, I'm Amet Marcelo Quispe Espichan
hero.subtitle: Systems and Computer Engineer, 9th-cycle student at UTP. Developer with experience in Python, database management, CI/CD and cloud environments (Azure, OpenShift, AWS).

about.title: About Me
about.bio1: I'm Amet Marcelo Quispe Espichan, a Systems Engineer in training (9th semester at UTP) passionate about web development, automation, and cloud. I design clean, scalable architectures in multidisciplinary teams.
about.professionalPath: IT Assistant at Zherobyte Spa (Nov 2022–Nov 2023), Cryptography Instructor at Salesland (Sep 2024–Nov 2024), and Azure DevOps Engineer at Digital Solutions 324 (Jan 2025–Mar 2025).
about.keySkills: Python, Flask, Vue 3, Laravel, SQL, Docker, Azure, AWS, OpenShift, and AI for process optimization and cloud security.
